product_name: PUMA Trail Crop Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The PUMA Trail Crop Tights for women work with you on the treadmill or in the hills. Polyester/spandex blend is backed with microfiber French Terry polyester and given a wicking finish. Elasticized waistband and drawcord keep everything in place. Mesh panels behind knees vent when things heat up. Flatlock stitching increases comfort and durability. Reflective logos increase visibility. Trail Crop Tights for women from PUMA have invisible-zip pockets to secure essentials. Closeout.
short_description: The PUMA Trail Crop Tights for women work with you on the treadmill or in the hills.
